snippet.title: Gameplay Trailer - Rail Nation 2021 -Short EN
snippet.description:
Play Rail Nation: ► http://youtube.rail-nation.com ◀ 
Your Multiplayer Train Manager 

Welcome to the world of Rail Nation. Here YOU will become a railway tycoon! Enter the transport simulation and discover the globally popular strategy game, train by train. You start in a small city that needs to be supplied with goods. Boost the economy to make the city – and your railway company – grow fast. Experience the history of railways in six authentic eras. Research modern technologies and choose from 150 realistic engines and trains.

--- 
Discord ► https://discord.gg/8rdZNGBxsc 
Facebook ► https://www.facebook.com/RailNationINT/ 
Twitter ► https://twitter.com/railnation 
Blog ► https://www.rail-nation.com/Blog/
